channel.title: NPC transforming
channel.description: how would i make items turn you into certain npcs? Tell me please :]

item.title: NPC transforming
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

i told you where to put it in an earlier post…

ok find
//WritePlayers();
WriteWildyLevel();

in client.java add the code below above it =p

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4657 == true){
		npcId = 1614;
		isNpc = true;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4657 == false){
		isNpc = false;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic

item.title: NPC transforming
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

Onyx ring doesn’t work on my server either anyways. I think it’s just a glitch in it. Just make it where red mask maked you turn into a death spawn, in other words, just change the npc id to the death spawn id, and the equipment id to the red mask’s id.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC transforming
item.dc:creator: @Pizz4_0wnz Pizz4 0wnz
item.description:
@Pizz4_0wnz wrote:

alright[br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2007, 03:53:00 PM[/size][hr]I put it in here and it wtill doesnt work… I don’t guess it will work… Im wearing the onyx ring and im not turning into a npc… WHAT I WANT is to be wearing a red mask and a onyx ring turn a mod-owner into a death spawn and a santa hat into santa and so forth… What am i supposed to do…

[code=c]public int GetWepAnim()
{
if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6575 == true){
npcId = 1614;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6575 == false){
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) // whip
{
return 1658;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)

//bows
{
return 426;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153) // maul
{
return 1665;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377) // dragon b axe
{
return 1833;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718) // dharoks axe
{
return 2067;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726) // guthans spear
{
return 2080;
}[/code]

item.title: NPC transforming
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

um gimmie a sec =p
\

		 if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == item id here) { 
			npcId = npc id here;
			isNpc = true;
		}

there ya go =p

thats for when you equip a ring.
heres some basic things that you can use =p

[playerHat] -hat
[playerCape] - cape
[playerAmulet] - amulet
[playerChest] - plate armour shirts etc.
[playerShield] - shield, defenders, books
[playerLegs] - plate legs, pants etc.
[playerHands] - gloves
[playerFeet] - boots
[playerArrows] - arrows
[playerWeapon] - anything used in the weapon hand

really hoped this helped you out alot =p

Read full topic
